mapper.update: update letsfutsal.free_board_comment set content = '삭제된 댓글입니다', is_deleted = true where comment_id = #{commentId}
mapper.insert: insert into letsfutsal.free_board (cate_id, author_id, title, content) values (#{article.cateId}, #{article.authorId}, #{article.title}, #{article.content})
insert into letsfutsal.free_board_comment (article_id, author_id, parent_id, content) values (#{comment.articleId}, #{comment.authorId}, #{comment.parentId}, #{comment.content})
mapper.select: select fb.*, u.nickname from letsfutsal.free_board fb join letsfutsal.user u on fb.author_id = u.user_id order by fb.created_at desc
select fb.*, u.nickname from letsfutsal.free_board fb join letsfutsal.user u on fb.author_id = u.user_id where fb.article_id = #{articleId} order by fb.created_at desc
select fb.*, u.nickname from letsfutsal.free_board fb join letsfutsal.user u on fb.author_id = u.user_id where u.nickname like concat('%', #{nickname}, '%') order by fb.created_at desc
select fb.*, u.nickname from letsfutsal.free_board fb join letsfutsal.user u on fb.author_id = u.user_id where fb.cate_id = #{cateId} order by fb.created_at desc

select distinct fb.*, u.nickname from letsfutsal.free_board fb join letsfutsal.free_board_comment fbc on fb.article_id = fbc.article_id join letsfutsal.user u on fb.author_id = u.user_id where fbc.content like concat('%', #{commentContent}, '%') order by fb.created_at desc
select fb.*, u.nickname from letsfutsal.free_board fb join letsfutsal.user u on fb.author_id = u.user_id where fb.content like concat('%', #{content}, '%') order by fb.created_at desc
select fb.*, u.nickname from letsfutsal.free_board fb join letsfutsal.user u on fb.author_id = u.user_id where fb.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') order by fb.created_at desc
select fbc.*, u.nickname from letsfutsal.free_board_comment fbc join letsfutsal.user u on fbc.author_id = u.user_id where fbc.article_id = #{articleId} order by fbc.created_at
